snippet: When the water rushes in, you make split-second decisions, some driven by practicality, others by the heart.
abstract: Michael Winerip Booming column describes the choices he made in what to save and what to discard when his Long Beach home flooded during Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: When the water rushes in, you make split-second decisions, some driven by practicality, others by the heart.

headline.print_headline: Quick Choices, Practical and Sentimental, About What to Save as the Water Rose
headline.main: What I Saved From the Flood
